page.title: 12Housing
page.content: In the Bagnall area the village is old styled cottages built of stone with old farm building surrounding the area. Most of these cottages have little gas but mainly coal and electricity. Recently the area has been an attraction to businessmen and there have appeared large expensive houses usually with large grounds to them dotted around the area.This has meant an increase in the commuting traffic. On the other side of the area near to Werrington a new housing estate is being built consisting of semi and detached houses in the new style.This has attracted a much younger type of couple with small families.
